column4: thing is the driver i need will have to be downloaded from the nvidia site. The nvidia-glx driver which the HOWTO guide recommends causes the comp to hang on the login screen or i get a blank screen
the restricted driver manager and envy didn't work for me, it's a known issue with geforce2 integrated gpu
so after i download NVIDIA-Linux-x86-1.0-8776-pkg1.run from the nvidia site, what do i do next?
you where already pointed to the nvidia how to
